Uses of Class
de.iftm.dcm4che.router.plugin.DicomRouterPlugin

Packages that use DicomRouterPlugin
de.iftm.dcm4che.router.plugin   
 

Uses of DicomRouterPlugin in de.iftm.dcm4che.router.plugin
 

Subclasses of DicomRouterPlugin in de.iftm.dcm4che.router.plugin
 class DicomStorageSCUPlugin
          This class extends the DicomRouterPlugin class and implements DicomRouterPlugin interface.
 class ExportImagePlugin
          This plugins exports the given Dataset as a standard graphic image.
 class InfoPlugin
          This plugin logs information of the processed dataset.
 class NullPlugin
          This plugin does nothing.
 class PortableMediaCreatorPlugin
          This plugins creates a IHE (Integrating the Healthcare Enterprise) PDI (Portable Data for Imaging) compatible file structure (see http://www.rsna.org/IHE/tf/ihe_tf_index.shtml).
 class PrivateRemovePlugin
          This removes all private elements of the submitted Dataset.
 class PseudonymPlugin
          This plugin replaces the PatientName with a pseudonym.
 class SaveDicomdirPlugin
          This plugins saves the given Dataset as a file to the local filesystem and stores a reference to this file in a DICOMDIR index file according DICOM Part 10.
 class SaveFilesystemPlugin
          This plugins saves the given Dataset to the lokal filesystem.
 class TagModifyPlugin
          This plugin modifies named elements of the submitted Dataset.
 class UIDModifyPlugin
          This plugin modifies the UID's.
 class XSLTransformPlugin
          This plugins transforms the given Dataset using a XSL document.
 

Fields in de.iftm.dcm4che.router.plugin declared as DicomRouterPlugin
private  DicomRouterPlugin DicomRouterPlugin.nextPluginInChain
          Holds value of property nextPluginInChain.
 

Methods in de.iftm.dcm4che.router.plugin that return DicomRouterPlugin
static DicomRouterPlugin DicomRouterPlugin.createByName(java.lang.String pluginName)
          Creates an instance of the plugin with the name of the plugin given as a String and initializes the plugin with the given prperties.
